ygData.subject: Re: taking the ghoulbane plunge
ygData.msgSnippet: This is kind of awkward but I think you would have problems with low level mobs jumping you and the other people below low levels. I guess it s possiblestill
ygData.messageBody:
This is kind of awkward but I think you would have problems with low level
mobs jumping you and the other people below low levels. I guess it's
possiblestill it's not very feasible and a level 17 with a Ghoulsbane is a
bit early. I'd wait at least 8 more levels before you attempt this because
your current group is going to have some problems.

Kananek

-----Original Message-----
From: Gary Long <glong@...>
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 12:20 PM
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] taking the ghoulbane plunge


>From: Gary Long <glong@...>
>
>Here's a question for those who have retrieved the Ghoulbane holy sword:
>
>My Paladin is 17th level, and one of the recent posts suggested that I
>should be using a Shiny Brass Halberd as my primary weapon at this
>point. I'm thinking that Ghoulbane would make a better primary weapon,
>since all that's required is to head into Froglock central and wipe out
>a fellow Froggie Paladin. I have a 35th level Magician and 35th level
>Druid who could help in this quest, as well as a 20th level Wizard and a
>19th level Cleric. Would my party of 5 stand a chance?
>
>Thanks,
>Kaladin, 17th level Paladin of Tunare
